mainText:
Hi all,

Today all of us have lost a genius. This genius has made a better world 
with his ideas and visions, and I`m feeling like I`ve lost a family 
member.
Steve, you now are in better place than all of us, probably laughing and 
thinking about your legacy left to Apple and us, your fans.
Rest in peace and thanks for all you did. I've become an apple fan just 
because of you.
author: Fabiano
